title: Looking for Bronze/Silver DUO

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
Hi there,
I am looking for low-elo duo partner. I started playing league again about 5 days ago, and I have really improved since I used to play (a month or so ago.) I main ADC, mostly Vayne I can play other roles well too. 
Things I am looking for:
-Decent game knowledge and mechanics
-Ability to peel for carries (if support/jungle)
-Don't be toxic, I hate toxic people. 

I am currently taking coaching lessons from a diamond 4 ADC main, trying to improve my in-game skill. 
Lets get to gold..

Thanks =)

replies.body: FuckHead Likes Gold. I shall add you.
Sure id be willing to climb with you
Honestly, it is way easier to climb in SOLO que rather than duo.

> [{quoted}](name=yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=FE3PZavu,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-19T04:46:29.088+0000)
>
> Honestly, it is way easier to climb in SOLO que rather than duo.

Yeah, but let him do it who cares :P
